channel.title: Help me!
channel.description:
when i run my server it says
"(myservername) is now online!
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrop(NPCHandler.java:2382) at NPCHandler.(init)(NPCHandler.java:27) at server.main(server.java:107)"
and when i try to sign in it goes black any idea on how to fix?? :/

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“Need for speed111, post:1, topic:350088”]when i run my server it says

"(myservername) is now online!

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45
at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrop(NPCHandler.java:2382)
at NPCHandler.(init)(NPCHandler.java:27)
at server.main(server.java:107)"

and when i try to sign in it goes black any idea on how to fix?? :/[/quote]You messed up something well editing the drops most likely, Make sure you use tabs and not spaces
